channel.title: How do I fix the white party hat?
channel.description: :mad: hmm...i have tried quit a few things but the white party hat still requires 99 def to wear...if anybody knows how to fix this PLEASE feel free to post here...ok and another thing, is there a way i can make certain items mod only, so nobody can wear them but staff? thanks to whoever posts a little help :)[br][size=1]Posted on: February 07, 2007, 12:59:44 PM[/size][hr] :eek: I have to leave for a while, if anybody has information on this please PM it to me on hamachi or leave a message on here.

item.title: How do I fix the white party hat?
item.dc:creator: @mod_abyssal mod abyssal
item.description:
@mod_abyssal wrote:

:mad: hmm…i have tried quit a few things but the white party hat still requires 99 def to wear…if anybody knows how to fix this PLEASE feel free to post here…ok and another thing, is there a way i can make certain items mod only, so nobody can wear them but staff? thanks to whoever posts a little help :)[br][size=1]Posted on: February 07, 2007, 12:59:44 PM[/size][hr] :eek: I have to leave for a while, if anybody has information on this please PM it to me on hamachi or leave a message on here.
